scripts.start: npm run copy-shareable & set PORT=3011 && react-scripts start
scripts.build: Xcopy /E /I /y ..\shareable src\shareable 2>null & react-scripts build --prefix src/first-app && RMDIR /S /Q ..\..\build\SiteAssets\pages\first 2>null & npm run move-js && npm run move-css && npm run move-html
